_source.content:
New Hampshire
A new law in New Hampshire, the only New England state to pass election reforms this year, requires the secretary of state to provide information on matches of death records against voter checklists.

Another law requires that those who register to vote on Election Day by using a voter affidavit or sworn statement must also have a photo taken beforehand. The Brennan Center claims the measure is among those that “restricts access to vote.”

Oklahoma
A new law in Oklahoma sets a 30-day limit for a county election board to remove dead voters from its registration list. Another law both expands early in-person voting and requires applications for absentee ballots to be received no later than 5 p.m. on the third Monday preceding an election.

A third Oklahoma law allows the State Election Board to participate in multistate organizations that maintain voter lists, such as the nonprofit Electronic Registration Information Center.

Texas
The new Texas law extends early voting hours, prohibits election clerks from mailing out an application for an absentee ballot unless a voter requests one, and bans “drive-through” voting. The measure also requires voter ID for mail-in ballots and safeguards for poll watchers.

The law also requires the Texas secretary of state to use specifics on a driver’s license to “verify the accuracy of citizenship status information previously provided on voter registration applications.”

Utah
Utah’s new law, known as HB 12, requires that the names of dead voters be removed from rolls and assigns the state’s lieutenant governor to enforce it.

The Brennan Center described the law and others removing dead people from voter rolls as a “purge.”

Wyoming
A new Wyoming law requires voters to show ID to vote in person. Acceptable forms of identification include a driver’s license, a state or tribal ID, a passport, a military ID, or one from a Wyoming public school, university, or community college.

“If we are at 75 percent, you see, it means this is the very definition of the Great Replacement.”

_source.content:
VERY GOOD ANALYSIS. EXCERPT:
So what, in the end, can we conclude? 1. We still do not know the real story about 9/11. 2. The official version is not credible. 3. 9/11 was used to justify invading strategic Afghanistan and oil-rich Iraq. 4. The attacks plunged America into wars against the Muslim world and enriched the US arms industry. 5. 9/11 boosted pro-Israel neoconservatives, formerly a fringe group, into power, and with them America’s totalitarian far right. 6. Bush’s unprovoked war against Iraq destroyed one of Israel’s two main enemies. 7. 9/11 put America in what may turn out to be a permanent state of war with the Muslim world – a key goal of the neoconservatives .

But I’ve seen no hard evidence to date that 9/11 was a plot by America’s far right or by Israel or a giant cover-up. Just, perhaps, the Mother of All Coincidences. In the end, it may just have been 19 angry Arabs and a bumbling Bush administration looking for someone else to blame.
https://www.lewrockwell.com/2021/09/eric-margolis/9-11-the-mother-of-all-coincidences/

I have been barraged with emails until my head spins with engineering studies about melting steel, controlled explosions, claims about nefarious plots, and wreckage analysis. One of the most colorful theories comes from Gen. Hamid Gul, former director of Pakistan’s intelligence agency, ISI. He insists that … Continue reading →

_source.contentraw:
Apostle Eric answers: “In this statement made by Kenneth Copeland, we see the same nagging question that is asked by many ministers about their inability to
#define #faith.

➡️ How are we supposed to define faith, and what is the sign of a strong faith?

👉 First, we can’t define faith (or anything of Jesus’ covenant) by going to the Hebrew dictionary.

It might surprise you to know that God does not use the Hebrew language to define faith, but rather the covenant of Jesus Christ. God designed a new frame of knowledge and new tools to define our contact with Him, and then He breathed upon it the breath of life in the anointing to make our faith living. That’s the strength of living faith.

Just as God gave a covenant to Abraham to frame his faith and justify his obedience, so also did God design faith to reflect Jesus’ knowledge so that He would justify our obedience. That’s the strength of true faith.

👉 True faith accepts the restrictions of the covenant to live in the liberty of Christ.

👉 Copeland puts the battle in the flesh (to try to get God to resolve his issues), but real faith reciprocates to God on the grounds of Jesus’ covenant. In this cycle of faith unto faith, God reciprocates the increase of our soul with the virtue of Christ. The strength of true faith is to reciprocate Christ.” -Apostle Eric vonAnderseck

You can start today to live a strong just as God promised.

group.description:
This is a group for all Christians on Gab who choose to keep the seventh-day Sabbath (Seventh-Day Adventists, Seventh-Day Baptists, Messianic Jews, Torah Observant, etc).

Why do we observe the seventh-day Sabbath?
The specific reasons vary, but generally we hold that the Fourth Commandment, written in stone, was never abolished or changed by Christ. Jesus/Yeshua/Messiah spoke often about how to keep the Sabbath, but throughout His life, and the rest of the New Testament, there is no Biblical command that changes the Sabbath day from the 7th to the 1st day of the week. Sunday observance in the Christian church has its origins in the pagan tradition of Sun worship and has no clear Scriptural foundation.

Christian Sabbath-Keepers choose to keep the seventh-day Sabbath holy in loving obedience to our Creator and Savior!

https://www.sabbathtruth.com https://www.seventhdaybaptist.org/sabbath https://brotherlance.com/commandment/ https://www.adventist.org/the-sabbath/the-sabbath-then-and-now

Group Rules: 1. Majority of your posts should be related to the Sabbath 2. Theological discussions welcome, personal attacks are not 3. Treat others in a Christ-like manner 4. Do not be intentionally divisive or hostile

Post that violate these rules will be removed and users who break these rules will be banned at the moderator's discretion. Tag @CT_Liberator in any posts that violate these rules for swift moderation.

_source.contentraw:
Apostle Eric answers: “In this statement made by Kenneth Copeland, we see the same nagging question that is asked by many ministers about their inability to
#define #faith.

➡️ How are we supposed to define faith, and what is the sign of a strong faith?

👉 First, we can’t define faith (or anything of Jesus’ covenant) by going to the Hebrew dictionary.

It might surprise you to know that God does not use the Hebrew language to define faith, but rather the covenant of Jesus Christ. God designed a new frame of knowledge and new tools to define our contact with Him, and then He breathed upon it the breath of life in the anointing to make our faith living. That’s the strength of living faith.

Just as God gave a covenant to Abraham to frame his faith and justify his obedience, so also did God design faith to reflect Jesus’ knowledge so that He would justify our obedience. That’s the strength of true faith.

👉 True faith accepts the restrictions of the covenant to live in the liberty of Christ.

👉 Copeland puts the battle in the flesh (to try to get God to resolve his issues), but real faith reciprocates to God on the grounds of Jesus’ covenant. In this cycle of faith unto faith, God reciprocates the increase of our soul with the virtue of Christ. The strength of true faith is to reciprocate Christ.” -Apostle Eric vonAnderseck

You can start today to live a strong just as God promised.

👉 Register for the IDCCST Course (registration is free)

Also to obey Revelation 18:4'Come out of her, my people,' so that you will not share in her sins, so that you will not receive any of her plagues; Feel free to post political articles that show why we must come out of her. Not just mentally but physically. I want you to think community in the sense of the Free State Project, Hasidic communities, Amish communities, etc... There is much to say on the topic. Just know this is not a new concept and only for those that are truly called by GOD and want to do his will.

THE GROUP IS NOT FOR DEBATING !
ITS FOR MOTIVATION AND BEING ABOUT THE FATHER BUSINESS !
ONLY KINGDOM BUILDING !
group.title: Yashua/Jesus, Torah Observant Kingdom Building

_source.contentraw:
Apostle Eric answers: “In this statement made by Kenneth Copeland, we see the same nagging question that is asked by many ministers about their inability to
#define #faith.

➡️ How are we supposed to define faith, and what is the sign of a strong faith?

👉 First, we can’t define faith (or anything of Jesus’ covenant) by going to the Hebrew dictionary.

It might surprise you to know that God does not use the Hebrew language to define faith, but rather the covenant of Jesus Christ. God designed a new frame of knowledge and new tools to define our contact with Him, and then He breathed upon it the breath of life in the anointing to make our faith living. That’s the strength of living faith.

Just as God gave a covenant to Abraham to frame his faith and justify his obedience, so also did God design faith to reflect Jesus’ knowledge so that He would justify our obedience. That’s the strength of true faith.

👉 True faith accepts the restrictions of the covenant to live in the liberty of Christ.

👉 Copeland puts the battle in the flesh (to try to get God to resolve his issues), but real faith reciprocates to God on the grounds of Jesus’ covenant. In this cycle of faith unto faith, God reciprocates the increase of our soul with the virtue of Christ. The strength of true faith is to reciprocate Christ.” -Apostle Eric vonAnderseck

You can start today to live a strong just as God promised.

👉 Register for the IDCCST Course (registration is free)

** http://s8w.org/idccst-online-course (or use the link in bio)

group.description:
Fidem et Dialecticus. 

The Logos is a self-referential, self-similar, quasi-crystaline, geometric 9th-dimensional hyper-structure that is at the most fundamental basis of time and space; which is to say that it is time and space, so to study The Logos is to study the Mind of God. I think that it also is The Kingdom of Heaven Within, refered to by Jesus Christ, therefore it is the Union between Science and Christianity. It is God's Transcendent Universal Reason revealed as Enlightened Wisdom.

In this Denomination, in addition to standard Christian practices, one would attempt to figure out how observed scientific and logical data and classifications fit into conformance with The New Testament. So, we would look at the chapters that talked about a specific topic, and then work to make sense of the observed data by logical means, applied rigorously, to see how it may be in conformance with what is already written in The New Testament. That's the whole point. This group is intended to use Logic, rigorously, to look at science, archaeology, and other _hard data_ from a Christian perspective. 

It is not about that airy-fairy New Age bullshit. When considering a hypothesis, language should be used to clarify that it is a hypothesis, merely. This isn't about creativity so much as processing and synthesizing data.

As an example of what I mean: The Story of The Flood has been corroborated by data in the last decade regarding a Meteor Impact on Greenland approximately 12,000 years ago, which would have melted a vast amount of ice, causing a global flood as the ocean level raised by possibly hundreds of feet, rapidly, in just weeks or months. Applying Logic to scientific data from a Christian perspective.

The New Testament, which I call The Christian Bible, is that which I keep covanents with, adhere to, and constantly seek to increase my understanding of. The Old Testament, being the Jewish Bible, is not, however. I know the Jewish Bible to not be a historically reliable source of information, most of the time, based on the evidence.

All posts that do not relate directly to final days events as prophesied in the bible will be removed.  Haters/disrespecters will be banned, as will pretentious theological pontificators seeking to argue every nuance of every post.

God designed a new frame of knowledge and new tools to define our contact with Him, and then He breathed upon it the breath of life in the anointing to make our faith living. That’s the strength of living faith.

Just as God gave a covenant to Abraham to frame his faith and justify his obedience, so also did God design faith to reflect Jesus’ knowledge so that He would justify our obedience. That’s the strength of true faith.

👉 True faith accepts the restrictions of the covenant to live in the liberty of Christ.

👉 Copeland puts the battle in the flesh (to try to get God to resolve his issues), but real faith reciprocates to God on the grounds of Jesus’ covenant. In this cycle of faith unto faith, God reciprocates the increase of our soul with the virtue of Christ. The strength of true faith is to reciprocate Christ.” -Apostle Eric vonAnderseck

You can start today to live a strong just as God promised.

NEW SHOW!

Join me as a featured guest co-host picks 10 metal vinyl albums for me that I’ve never heard before! Includes discussion of the albums between the two of us and then my opinion after hearing each one. Did I like them? Did I hate them? Watch and find out!

In this episode of Hook Me Up, I discover albums from Dead Congregation, Deathhammer, Innsmouth, Morbid Saint, Mortem, Mortiferum, Necrot, Pentacle, Perdition Temple, and Unaussprechlichen Kulten. Guest co-host: Eric Bloom (no, not the Blue Öyster Cult guy).

Remember to like and share the video, as well as subscribe to the YouTube channel. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GWrDrE3FAcw

_source.content:
Professor preposterously says 9/11 was an attack on America’s heteropatriarchal capitalist systems
By Eric Utter
Dr. Jenn Jackson is a professor of political science at Syracuse University. Dr. Jackson’s website biography reads, "Jenn M. Jackson (they/them) is a queer gender flux androgynous Black woman, an abolitionist, a lover of all Black people, and an Assistant Professor at Syracuse University in the Department of Political Science." (A gender flux androgynous woman?!)

Why do I mention…er…um…them? Because Jackson published a series of tweets on Friday, September 10th, in which she they made preposterous claims about the motive for the terrorist attacks of 9/11 that killed nearly 3,000 innocent Americans of every race, creed, gender, sexual orientation, and color.

https://www.americanthinker.com/blog/2021/09/professor_preposterously_says_911_was_an_attack_on_americas_heteropatriarchal_capitalist_systems.html

_source.contentraw:
@DemsFearTruth The Kansas City metro team were pretty busy on 9/1. First, We met up at Rae’s Cafe in Blue Springs, MO early in the morning to support the owner of the cafe. The owner of Rae’s is being persecuted by the City of Blue Spring Health Dept & the Jackson County Health Dept for not complying to their “mandate” requiring the employees “must be masked”. The owner temporarily circumvented the 1st injunction to close by beginning to operate as a “private club”, members were charged a membership fee if $1.00, & Rae’s Cafe remained open. A 2nd injunction was issued shortly thereafter. The restaurant’s owner again refused to comply with that injunction. Then the County Health Dept stepped in and another injunction was issue in the late afternoon Friday Sept 10th. There were 200 (best guess) assembled in the parking lot to support the owner & employees of Rae’s Cafe. The Pledge of Allegiance was recited by the supporter & the National Anthem sung (with gusto🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸), and a local Pastor delivered the invocation. (Video to follow. It’s a 2:04 minute 360 of the gathered supporters)

Our State Attorney General, Eric Schmitt arrived and blathered about American values, and working to prevent mask mandates (technically the Show-Me State has NO Statewide mandate), and forced Jabs, or Jab Passports. I left as he was speaking about the issues at hand with Rae’s Cafe, the legal system and such, to get to our “banner protest” location in Independence, MO.

We got set-up on the West - East bound lanes of I70

_source.content: (@DenisetheKelt @a@gab)On Bombs:There are over 50 independent accounts of a plane being seen flying into the Pentagon.  There are no witnesses that came forward saying "I heard people reporting it was a plane:  it wasn't a plane, it was a missile".  So, with the light post shaving, grant me the plane.  But there was virtually no debris.  French researcher Eric Bart supposes that there were shape charges placed inside the plane to powderize the fuselage and make the "debris" appear like (difficult to see and track) confetti.  Along with the 50 accounts of plane sightings at the Pentagon, there were also many accounts saying the plane seemed to strangely "disappear" on impact.  This again supports Bart's (obscure) smithereens hypothesis.At the WTC, one of the problems of the official version is that aluminum-based plane airframes on their own would not compose a major threat to the steel I-beams of the towers.  This is often alluded to in 911 videos showing airframes damaged by birds and hail.  But what if the WTC planes, as well, were loaded with "impact bombs" and those are the explosions (with the jet fuel) that you see instantaneously after the planes' impact on the towers?  High heat is a major threat to the hardness-to-softness of steel and its ability to maintain weight and bear stress.  Were plane loaded bombs the catalyst for the damage?  The attack was done by the same people, why not suspect (and or expect) the same weaponology at both sites?Which brings me here:  the three flights were commercial flights.  To load and place sophisticated bombs on board would have required cooperation from a team of ground support personnel.  This team could have also removed before takeoff the black boxes that were never found.  This team would have created a deep trail of contacts to the planners.  Yet no ground crews were investigated, charged or tried.In addition, the "it was a missile" theory offers cover for the actual conspiracy involving Flight 77.  Debate the missile, you never accept the plane.  Not accepting the plane you never get to sophisticated shape charges in the plane.  If you never get to shape charges, you never look at ground crews.  Hence, cover successful.  Likewise, the "controlled demolition" theory offers cover for the planes being specially loaded with high heat producing munitions. A truly well-planned operation would have provided trap doors for "independent thinkers" (i.e., those damn conspiracy theorists) to fall through so that they would not get to the core of how it was done, and use that information to track the people on the ground who enabled how it was done.Just a thought, or two.(Thanks for reading {to those who got here}.)

(
@DenisetheKelt
@a
@gab
)

On Bombs:

There are over 50 independent accounts of a plane being seen flying into the Pentagon. There are no witnesses that came forward saying "I heard people reporting it was a plane: it wasn't a plane, it was a missile". So, with the light post shaving, grant me the plane. But there was virtually no debris. French researcher Eric Bart supposes that there were shape charges placed inside the plane to powderize the fuselage and make the "debris" appear like (difficult to see and track) confetti. Along with the 50 accounts of plane sightings at the Pentagon, there were also many accounts saying the plane seemed to strangely "disappear" on impact. This again supports Bart's (obscure) smithereens hypothesis.

At the WTC, one of the problems of the official version is that aluminum-based plane airframes on their own would not compose a major threat to the steel I-beams of the towers. This is often alluded to in 911 videos showing airframes damaged by birds and hail. But what if the WTC planes, as well, were loaded with "impact bombs" and those are the explosions (with the jet fuel) that you see instantaneously after the planes' impact on the towers? High heat is a major threat to the hardness-to-softness of steel and its ability to maintain weight and bear stress. Were plane loaded bombs the catalyst for the damage? The attack was done by the same people, why not suspect (and or expect) the same weaponology at both sites?

Which brings me here: the three flights were commercial flights. To load and place sophisticated bombs on board would have required cooperation from a team of ground support personnel. This team could have also removed before takeoff the black boxes that were never found. This team would have created a deep trail of contacts to the planners. Yet no ground crews were investigated, charged or tried.

In addition, the "it was a missile" theory offers cover for the actual conspiracy involving Flight 77. Debate the missile, you never accept the plane. Not accepting the plane you never get to sophisticated shape charges in the plane. If you never get to shape charges, you never look at ground crews. Hence, cover successful. Likewise, the "controlled demolition" theory offers cover for the planes being specially loaded with high heat producing munitions. A truly well-planned operation would have provided trap doors for "independent thinkers" (i.e., those damn conspiracy theorists) to fall through so that they would not get to the core of how it was done, and use that information to track the people on the ground who enabled how it was done.

Just a thought, or two.
(Thanks for reading {to those who got here}.)

The U.S. Navy-Marine Corps Court of Criminal Appeals on Sept. 9, in the case of U.S. v. Ali Alkazahg, said that the 2018 order that “directed the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives [ATF] to issue a new interpretation of a rule—that contradicted the ATF’s previous interpretation—governing legislation from the 1930s.”

“This Executive-Branch change in statutory interpretation aimed to outlaw bump stocks prospectively, without a change in existing statutes,” the court ruled, suggesting that the ATF bypassed Congress by creating a law when only Congress has that power under the Constitution.

In the case, Akazahg, a Marine Corps private, was convicted of possessing two machine guns, which were actually bump stocks, in violation of Articles 83, 107, and 134 of the Uniform Code of Military Justice. Lawyers for the Marine argued that bump stocks didn’t meet the definition of machine guns.

The court ultimately agreed with Akazahg’s lawyers, issuing a unanimous ruling.

“In 1986, Congress passed the Firearms Owners’ Protection Act [FOPA], banning possession of machine guns not owned before 1986,” the judges wrote. “FOPA also banned any parts, to include frames and receivers, which were part of a machine gun or were designed for converting a weapon into a machine gun.”

It added, “Due to having a bump stock, Appellant was charged under the statute which states that a machine gun is ‘any weapon which shoots, is designed to shoot, or can be readily restored to shoot, automatically, more than one shot, without manual reloading, by a single function of the trigger.'” But they said that a bump stock doesn’t meet that definition.

In late 2018, then-acting Attorney General Matthew Whitaker amended an ATF rule that determined bump stocks fall within the definition of being a machine gun under federal law.

“Such devices allow a shooter of a semiautomatic firearm to initiate a continuous firing cycle with a single pull of the trigger,” says the ATF’s website on the rule. It was established after the mass shooting in Las Vegas in 2017, in which a gunman allegedly used semiautomatic rifles with bump stocks to kill 58 people.

But in March 2021, the Sixth Circuit Court of Appeals struck down the ban on bump stocks, disagreeing with the ATF’s interpretation of the law. Despite the court order, the ATF’s website still characterizes the devices as machine guns.

“It is not the role of the executive—particularly the unelected administrative state—to dictate to the public what is right and what is wrong,” stated Judges Alice Batchelder and Eric Murphy of the 6th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals, who wrote the 2-1 majority opinion. “Granting the executive the right both to determine a criminal statute’s meaning and to enforce that same criminal statute poses a severe risk to individual liberty,” they noted.
